errors.notEnoughEth: Not enough Ethereum for the gas fee on this transaction. Est gas fee %{estimatedMinerFee}
errors.amountToSmall: Amount too small. The minimum trade amount for this pair is %{minLimit}.
errors.negativeMax: Not enough funds for the miner fee on this transaction. Est miner fee %{estimatedMinerFee}
errors.invalidMax: Invalid Amount. The maximum trade amount for this pair is %{maxLimit}.
errors.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds for miner fee and amount
errors.insufficientFundsForLimit: Insufficient funds. The minimum trade amount for this pair is %{minLimit}.
errors.insufficientFundsForAmount: Insufficient funds. Your %{symbol} balance is less than the selected amount.
errors.noLiquidityError: No liquidity available for selected pair.
errors.overMaxSlippage: This trade would result in over %{slippagePercentage}% slippage. Please trade a lower amount for a better price.
errors.balanceToLow: Balance too low. The minimum trade amount for this pair is %{minLimit}.
errors.quoteFailed: An error occurred getting a quote for your trade.

receive.onlySend: Only send %{asset} (%{symbol}) to this address. Sending any other coins may result in permanent loss.
receive.copyFailed: Failed to copy %{symbol} receive address to clipboard

keepKey.body: Use PIN layout shown on your device to find the location to press on the pin pad.

nativeImport.body: Enter your 12 word seed phrase to import an exisiting wallet

nativePasswd.body: Enter a password to encrypt your wallet. In order to securely store your keys we will encrypt them, choose a string password you can remember.

nativePassReq.body: Enter your native wallet password to decrypt the wallet stored in your browser.

nativeSeed.body: Write these 12 words down and store them securely offline. This 12 word phrase is used to recover your wallet private keys.

nativeStart.body: Would you like to create a new wallet or import an existing one?

nativeSuccess.error: There was an error connecting your wallet

selectModal.body: By connecting a wallet, you agree to ShapeShift's Terms of Service and acknowledge that you have read and understand the ShapeShift disclaimer.

rewards.currentAPRLabel: The current APR for your rewards
